description: This file defines the routing endpoints for order-related operations in an Express.js backend, including placing an order and retrieving user-specific order history. It imports middleware for authentication and validation, references controller functions, and includes Swagger documentation comments.

methods.name: router.post
methods.description: Defines the POST endpoint for creating a new order that requires authentication and request validation.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Defines the GET endpoint for fetching order history of the current user, requiring authentication.
